column5: Spent the Aboriginal Day long weekend up @ my lease setting up camp and working on my dock. Camp is set up @ the back of the lease beside where the cabin is going.    Got the dock ramp in place but I have decided it needs to go lower down on the rock. Drilled new holes for the anchors and picked up new anchors on the way home today.    Also started work on the main dock. Hope to get it ready to go in next weekend and then with a buddies help I will get it in on Canada Day.    A long shot from off shore. You can't even see the camp from the water.
Im not jealous at all. Really, im not. Not even a little  S.
WHEW!!!! Thank goodness, wouldn't want that to happen.
Got a name for the camp yet?  Nice piece of rock you got to call home. I envy you.  Cheers, Ron...
Beautiful place!!  Are you going to build the cabin yourself?
Camp is going to be named after the town in my favourite movie........Rock Ridge. Yes, building it myself Simon.
Looks awesome! What a piece of heaven you have for yourself there.
Beauty spot there Drifter , lakers right out your front door !
noice! looking forward to progress reports and the inevitable expenses-paid g2g you'll put on
Nice start Dave.  Is that Wilson I see floating about?
Let us know when the camp warming party is. Im eagerly anticipating following this build make sure you keep us updated.
Everyone's invited!!! Entry is one 60oz bottle of amber rum per person.
What do you do in Rock ridge for excitement?  I'll play cards.   Lol.
You need a carpenter to help ya for a bit?  White rum for me, but can choke that amber back!
